page.title: 15LEISURE (Survey-Part three)
page.content: Our questionaire (see page 13) had a long list of indoor and outdoor sporting activities. People were asked to show which activities they took part in regularly. In this area we are fortunate in having a swimming pool, many clubs and also the lakes and mountains around Windermere and Coniston are easily accessible. From the 176 replies the main sports in order of popularity are: Swimming(100)Keep-fit(44)Football(26) Pool&Snooker(24)Running(23)Darts(20) Badminton(19)Fishing(18)Tennis(17) Ballet(16)Fell-walking(15)Squash(13) Golf(12)Cricket(10)Bowls(8)Cycling(7) Rugby(6)Watersports(5)Climbing(4) Orienteering(3).
